items.raw_string: Unpaid director of NGC Networks Ltd and NGC Network Services Ltd, and company secretary of the latter. I also have a shareholding, which is below the registrable level, in each company.This is a delayed update to which the rectification procedure was applied on 23 March 2017. Paragraph 16 of Chapter 4 of the 2015 Guide to the Rules refers. (Registered 11 October 2016; updated 23 March 2017)
